name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: During their recent summit, the South Korean president gave North Korean leader Kim Jong Un a USB drive. Kim Jong Un said, "Thank you, this looks delicious." Sarah Huckabee Sanders said she is unaware of hush money payments made by President Trump to other women. Then Sanders opened an envelope full of cash and said, “I’m sorry, I can’t talk anymore.” According to a new article on Melania Trump, most evenings she does not have dinner with President Trump. Melania said, “Occasionally, I’ll join him during his third breakfast.” On Saturday, Elon Musk tweeted that he wants to start a candy company. Then today, Elon Musk tweeted that his candy company is already three months behind in production. Rudy Giuliani was on TV this weekend and said President Trump may take the Fifth. It’s unclear if Giuliani is referring to amendments or wives. On Friday, a man in Wisconsin broke a world record by eating his 30,000th Big Mac. Meanwhile, another man broke a world record by eating at Long John Silver’s twice.
